FuncDef: This command enables and configures the upstream retransmission server configuration parameters.

ParaDef.Info: This keyword explicitly disables the upstream retransmission server within the policy. For the default bundle within the default Multicast Information Policy, the no form of the command and the disable keyword have the same meaning and imply the server is disabled.
The IP address of the upstream retransmission server.
The UDP port to use to send RET requests to the upstream RET server. Values-1024 to 5999, 6251 to 65535.

ExtraInfo: Default: no rt-server - The upstream retransmission server settings are inherited.
